details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.9 Annotations - 8.9.2.3 Markup annotations - Annot structure element
details.description: Markup annotations shall be enclosed within Annot structure elements

rule.description: Markup annotations shall be enclosed within Annot structure elements

error.message: A Markup annotation is an Artifact or is nested within %1 tag (standard type = %2) instead of Annot
